title: Newly updated condo for rental
map_address: 34896 Mercer Ln near 15 Mile and Utica Road
posting_body: ['34896 Mercer 12 Fraser, MI  48026', '$1400.00 / Month', '---------------------------', 'Interested in this property?', 'Reply to this listing for more information.', '---------------------------', 'Property Details:', '2 BEDROOMS | 2 BATHROOMS', 'Spacious, 2 bedroom 2 full bath, 2nd floor condo, conveniently located near shopping, restaurants, schools, Freedom Hill Amphitheatre, and other amenities.', ' New luxury vinyl plank flooring throughout, large living and dining space, updated kitchen, and door wall off living room to private balcony.', ' Freshly painted with neutral color to welcome any furniture you bring in.', ' Master bedroom has walk-in closet and attached bathroom.', ' The unit has lots of storage space, large laundry/utility room with adjacent storage room.', ' Rent includes association fee, snow removal, outside maintenance, sewer and water.', ' Unit comes with carport #12, additional parking at entrance off Mercer Lane.', ' As part of application, tenant will pay background check fee ($33/adult) at <URL>.', ' Move in cost is security deposit of 1.5 months rent plus first month’s rent.', '***No Pets Allowed***', 'Property Type:', 'Condo', 'Lease Terms:', '$1400.00/Month', '$2100.00 Deposit', 'Lease Length:', 'One Year', 'Available:', '07/15/2022', 'Unit Amenities:', 'Dishwasher', 'Dryer', 'Refrigerator', 'Washer', 'Microwave', 'Garbage Disposal', 'Oven', 'Building Amenities:', 'Cable Ready', 'Wired For Internet', 'Near Parks', '---------------------------', 'Interested in this property?', 'Reply to this listing for more information.']
